targets.query: SELECT (sum("memory_used")/sum("memory_total")*100) FROM "amd_rocm_smi" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /^$GPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (sum("memory_used") / sum("memory_total"))*100 FROM "amd_rocm_smi" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /^$GPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT distinct("clocks_current_memory") FROM "amd_rocm_smi" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /^$GPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("clocks_current_sm") FROM "amd_rocm_smi" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /^$GPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("temperature_sensor_edge") FROM "amd_rocm_smi" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /^$GPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("temperature_sensor_junction") FROM "rocm_smi" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /^$GPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("temperature_sensor_memory") FROM "rocm_smi" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /^$GPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "rocm_smi" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "rocm_smi" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "rocm_smi" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
list.label: GPU
list.name: GPU
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "rocm_smi" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
